job_history.work_description: Maintaining and reconciling inventory through clerical support, using PeopleSoft to procure and receive shipments obtained by purchase order. Create excel spread sheets for reports, manage inventory files and research inventory problems. Conduct inventory cycle counts, coordinate stock and document transactions. Provide Customer Service to Departmental and Fleet Maintenance Personnel, process work orders and fill Fleet Purchase Requisitions, contact vendors to procure fuel, parts and other automobile and truck supplies for fleet services.

Providing daily instruction to warehouse personnel and dispatching drivers for deliveries and pickups. Routine cycle counts of inventory insure and verify, proper placement of inventory. Receive all incoming shipments and verify counts create stock locations. Maintain inventory and quality control procedures.
Worked as an aircraft hydraulic and structural systems mechanic as a member of Naval Aircraft Squadron VS-38.

skills.name: Inventory Management
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in managing inventory, conducting cycle counts, and verifying inventory levels across multiple roles, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Provided customer service to departmental and fleet maintenance personnel, and processed work orders and fill fleet purchase requisitions, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Provided daily instruction to warehouse personnel and dispatched drivers for deliveries and pickups, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Quality Control
skills.explanation: Maintained inventory and quality control procedures, suggesting strong proficiency in quality control.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Created excel spreadsheets for reports, indicating a solid working proficiency in Microsoft Excel.

skills.name: Procurement
skills.explanation: Used PeopleSoft to procure and receive shipments, and contacted vendors to procure fuel, parts, and other supplies, indicating a solid working proficiency in procurement.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Conducted routine cycle counts of inventory and verified counts, suggesting some practical experience in data analysis.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: No direct experience in project management, but may have managed small projects or tasks, indicating basic familiarity.
